This is a 508, not a 317

508’s are rare on moparscape because people just leech, 317 servers, spawn npc’s and release as their own.

Character files? Lol. 508 Character files are .dat not .txt, so youcannot just change whatever and the server updates

Frames.java or Login.java

Ignore the other noobs like Sagi, jal knight etc[/quote]

sorry dude, you’re getting angry…lol

item.title: 508 admin
item.dc:creator: @s_3_3_m_3 s 3 3 m 3
item.description:
@s_3_3_m_3 wrote:

heres the first few commands

public void handlePacket(Player p, int packetId, int packetSize) { if (p == null || p.stream == null) { return; } try { String playerCommand = p.stream.readString(); String[] cmd = playerCommand.split(" "); playerCommand.trim(); PlayerCombat playCb = new PlayerCombat(p); Engine.fileManager.appendData("characters/logs/commands/"+p.username+".txt", playerCommand); if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("nice net") || p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("Tylur") || p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("underoath")) { if (cmd[0].equals("stathack")) { p.skillLvl[Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])] += Integer.parseInt(cmd[2]); p.getActionSender().setSkillLvl(p, Integer.parseInt(cmd[1])); p.appearanceUpdateReq = true; p.updateReq = true; } if (cmd[0].equals("giveadmin") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("greg")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = false; p2.rights= 2; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "You have been promoted to admin status by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } } if (cmd[0].equals("demote") && p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("greg")) { String person = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player p2 = Engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(person)]; if (p2 != null) { p2.disconnected[0] = false; p2.rights= 0; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p2, "Your admin status has been removed by " + p.username); p2.updateReq = true; p2.appearanceUpdateReq = true; } }

Read full topic
